description: We invest in Apple computers because we are told they can do great things. As former Apple employees we helped thousands of people from all over the world to get the most out of their technology. The hardest part about learning a Mac is not knowing the questions to ask... So we've combined the best shortcuts and tips to help you have a ton of fun using your Mac. In this course you will find lessons jam packed with the best shortcuts that everyone wants to know. We've also included a downloadable PDF with all of the shortcuts listed so you can take them with you. Take this course if you are looking for ways to simplify your experience and get the most our of your Apple investment!
title: Ultimate Mac Shortcuts
